articles.title: Vision Transformer on a Budget
articles.description:
Introduction The vanilla ViT is problematic. If you take a look at the original ViT paper [1], you’ll notice that although this deep learning model proved to work extremely well, it requires hundreds of millions of labeled training images to achieve this.  Well, that’s a lot.  This requirement of an enormous amount of data is definitely […]
The post Vision Transformer on a Budget appeared first on Towards Data Science.

articles.title: Join us at the third Women in ML Symposium!
articles.description:
Posted by Sharbani Roy – Senior Director, Product Management, Google 

We're back with the third annual Women in Machine Learning Symposium on December 7, 2023! Join us virtually from 9:30 am to 1:00 pm PT for an immersive and insightful set of deep dives for every level of Machine Learning experience.
The Women in ML Symposium is an inclusive event for anyone passionate about the transformative fields of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI). Dive into the latest advancements
articles.author: TensorFlow Blog (noreply@blogger.com)
